vsParam:
Alright, I'm going to do it alone this time!
I'm a bit scared, but I must be brave!

Ah!?
S-Sorel? What are you doing here!?

Lydie, where do you plan to go all by yourself?
There are monsters outside the Academy.

Hmm, uh...
Actually, I just took another commission to make money.

This time I undertook a synthesis commission
that I can do by myself.

But I found that I didn't have enough ingredients
when I was about to synthesize... So...

You want to gather ingredients outside?
Gee, Lydie. Don't be silly. We're friends.

Yeah! You should ask us to help you without
any hesitation at times like this.

B-but...
I always cause trouble to you guys...

Don't mention it. It's nothing.
Because you are our "partner" in the Academy!

We said before that we must help one another in times of difficulty!
This is the agreement among "partners" in the Academy!

O-OK...
I guess I'll have to trouble you again...

Yeah, just leave it to us!
Guys, let's go!

Wow... Thank you!
These ingredients should be enough for my synthesis!

I'll be done in a minute.
Please wait!

Well done, Lydie!
Wow, you did great!
Now you just need to deliver this thing... Right?
Yes! We need to divide the remuneration...

Because we just helped you with the gathering.
We can't take the remuneration.

Let me put it in another way. If you ask your
father to help you, will you pay him?

Ha ha, you didn't even think...
See, same logic.

We are already "partners" in the Academy.
Don't haggle over things like remuneration.

Exactly! Just tell us when you need help.
Treat us as your real family, OK?
Just tell us when you need help, okay?
... Hee hee, mom, do you see this?

Although I came to a different world...
I'm very lucky to meet a group of very kind people!
